wikipedia_page.main: Major General Sir Eric Bertram Rowcroft  (28 January 1891 – 27 December 1963), was a British Army officer. His military career started in 1908 as a TA Officer in the Royal Engineers and retired at the rank of Major General in 1946. He is noted for his involvement in the formation of The Corps of Royal Electrical and Mechanical Engineers (REME) and the planning of Operation Overlord.

response: *Sir Eric Bertram Rowcroft (1881–1963), British Army major-general and founder of REME, retired to Lyme Regis and died there.
*Major-General Eric Bertram Rowcroft, C.B.E., M.I.Mech.E., M.I.E.E., late Royal Army Service Corps.
*Major-General Eric Bertram Rowcroft, CB, CBE, MIMechE, MIEE (4585), late Royal Army Service Corps.
*Captain Eric Bertram Rowcroft  Royal Army Service Corps, Instructor Royal Army Service Corps Training College, Aldershot
